specifications.Variety: Red and yellow Catuai, Mundo Novo, Bourbon, Catucai, yellow Pacamara, Icatu, Geisha, Catigu√° MG3, Aramosa, Kent

description:
Brazil Organic Dutra Natural 14/16 comes from a family-owned coffee farm in Sao Joao do Manjuacu inland from the east coast of Brazil. This coffee has a delicate but citric acidity and a smooth body with notes of cherry, cocoa, and raisin
Cupping Notes: Sweet, medium brightness and body with notes of cherry, cocoa, and raisin.
